cast.name: 胡里奥·阿莱曼 Julio Alemán

director.name: 阿曼多·罗伯斯·戈多伊 Armando Robles Godoy

introduction: 阿曼多·罗伯斯·戈多伊根据自己作为一名宅地主的经历，导演了这部诗意的、视觉上令人惊叹的戏剧，讲述了一对城市夫妇为了生活在秘鲁丛林而放弃一切的故事。作为拉丁美洲电影的里程碑，这部电影被公认为杰作。在这些远离城市杂乱、回归自然生活的日子里，“绿墙”是一首关于我们许多人想要过的生活的诗。Based on his own experiences as a homesteader, Armando Robles Godoy directs this poetic, visually stunning drama about an urban couple who gives it all up to go live in the jungles of Peru. A landmark film of Latin American cinema, this film was universally praised as a masterpiece.In these days of a movement away from the urban clutter and back to a more natural life, "The Green Wall" is a poem about the life a lot of us would like to lead.
